description:
Shio and Akari, Eiyu`s childhood friends, each try to get his attention in their own twisted way.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Road to School? Indirect Kiss? Butt on Lap? Still Won`t Start a Rom-Com
Tsuugakuro de mo Kansetsu Kiss de mo Oshiri o Nosete mo Lovecome ni Naranai
通学路でも間接キスでもお尻を乗せてもラブコメにならない
